name: Cluster Operator OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Cluster Operator OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.

description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the Topic Operator OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.

name: User Operator OpenMetrics endpoint health
description: Returns `CRITICAL` if the Agent is unable to connect to the User Operator OpenMetrics endpoint, otherwise returns `OK`.
